slogan.description: 数据可观测性平台，数据目录&数据质量监控平台

feature.title: 数据目录
feature.details: 自动获取数据源元数据，构造企业级数据目录；定时监听数据变更情况

feature.title: 数据质量监控
feature.details: 平台内置多个数据质量检查规则，开箱即用；提供告警消息管理帮助你更好把握质量情况

feature.title: 微内核+插件化
feature.details: 平台以插件化设计为核心，支持数据源、规则、告警组件、错误数据存储和注册中心等插件设计

feature.title: 数据概览
feature.details: 让你能够更快更轻松地了解每个数据集的情况，做到心里有数

feature.title: 健壮稳定
feature.details: 大数据领域资深玩家打造,设计经过精心打磨,测试用例齐全

feature.title: 多种运行模式
feature.details: DataVines不仅提供平台帮助你观测数据，也支持本地模式集成到调度系统的工作流中

slogan.description: Data Observability Platform, Data Catalog & Data Quality Monitoring Platform.

feature.title: Data Catalog
feature.details: Automatically obtain datasource metadata and construct enterprise-level data catalog; Regularly monitor data schema changes.

feature.title: Data Quality Monitor
feature.details: Multiple data quality check rules are built in the platform, which can be used out of the box; Provide alarm message management to help you better grasp the quality situation.

feature.title: Microkernel & Plug-in
feature.details: With plug-in design as the core, the platform supports plug-in design of datasources, rules, alarm components, error data storage and registry.

feature.title: Data Profile
feature.details: Data profile enables you to understand the situation of each data set faster and more easily, so that you have a clear idea.

feature.title: Robust and stable
feature.details: Created by big data experts. Well-designed. Complete test cases.

feature.title: Multiple Mode
feature.details: DataVines not only provides a platform to help you observe data, but also supports local mode integration into the workflow of the scheduling system.
